still
better than not all[/bq]
I'll make a quick post since league's servers are back up; the difference between a war and conflict is that a war is when the year's death total is more than a thousand; a conflict is when the year's death total is less than a thousand.  There's plenty of conflicts, but I don't think you would call fifty deaths a fullblown war.  Contrary to popular belief there's only 10 wars right now and five of which are cooling down and will be classified as conflicts soon.  There's less and less total number of wars in the world and as time goes on this trend will continue until "world peace" is achieved in that with the exception of the middle east war will become a very rare occurrence.  There will always be war in the world, but with the exception of the middle east wars will only happen once every couple decades or so.

Tl:dr; everywhere else in the world there will probably be zero wars in the world or they will only happen every couple decades but the middle east will always be a hotbed for wars.

Tl:dr; 2040: almost all wars will be solely in the middle east.

*edit damn it; can't play league yet cause I have to wait for something.
